product_name: PMI E-Z Bend Sport Static Rope - 11mm x 46m
long_description: This low-stretch PMI static rope with knot-friendly EZ-Bend sheath braiding is a favorite of cavers and search-and-rescue teams. Durable EZ-Bend(TM) nylon sheath offers greater flexibility than most static ropes, making it easier to knot and untie. Kernmantle design matches a static nylon core (kern) with an abrasion-resistant braided nylon sheath (mantle) for durability. Kernmantle construction gives it greater flexibility than most static ropes, with low static elongation. Especially useful in applications where dynamic "bounce" is unwanted: jumaring, rappelling and hauling. Sold in a 46m (~150ft.) length; diameter is 11mm (~7/16in.).
short_description: This low-stretch PMI static rope with knot-friendly EZ-Bend sheath braiding is a favorite of cavers and search-and-rescue teams.
